hero.title: Tera imbere ubucuruzi bwawe na ReplySwiftDesk
hero.subtitle: Marketing kuri murandasi, ibikorwa by’ubuhanzi, n’ubufasha bwa kure.
hero.description: Dufasha ibigo bigamije iterambere kugera ku ntsinzi no gutegeka isoko ryabyo.

cta.exploreServicesDescription: Sobanukirwa uburyo serivisi zacu zishobora gufasha ubucuruzi bwawe gukura.

marketingTeam.title: Menya Itsinda Ryacu rya Marketing
marketingTeam.paragraph1: Itsinda ryacu rihuza ubuhanzi, uburyo, n’ikoranabuhanga kugira ngo ritange ibisubizo byiza.
marketingTeam.paragraph2: Twibanda ku bikorwa byongera kwitabirwa n’abakiriya kandi byongera inyungu.

ourStory.title: Inkuru Yacu
ourStory.description: ReplySwiftDesk yashinzwe mu rwego rwo gufasha ibigo binyuze mu makuru n’ubumenyi bwo kumenyekanisha ibikorwa byabyo.

redesign.title: Gusubiramo no Kunoza
redesign.desc: Kunoza imbuga zawe za internet hamwe n’umurongo mushya n’imikorere igezweho.

email.title: Marketing ya Email
email.desc: Shyikiriza abakiriya bawe neza n’ubutumwa bwihariye bukora neza.

digital.title: Marketing Digital
digital.desc: Kongera kugaragara kuri murandasi ukoresheje gahunda zihariye zishingiye ku mibare.

social.title: Gucunga Imbuga Nkora
social.desc: Shyigikira abakiriya bawe kandi wongere uruhare rwabo ku mbuga nkoranyambaga.

support.title: Serivisi z’Abakiriya
support.desc: Ibisubizo byihuse kandi byiza byo guha abakiriya ibyishimo.

virtual.title: Ubufasha Bw’Akazi ka Kure
virtual.desc: Ubufasha bw’umwuga mu bikorwa bya buri munsi no mu mirimo y’ofisi.

newsletter.title: Iyandikishe kuri Newsletter
newsletter.description: Komeza umenye amakuru n’ibikorwa bishya bya ReplySwiftDesk.

careers.title: Injira mu Itsinda Ryacu
careers.intro: Turashaka abantu bafite impano bashobora gukorana natwe.

contact.title: Twandikire
contact.subtitle: Twandikire kugira ngo ubone ibisubizo bijyanye n’ibyo ukeneye.

about.title: Ibyerekeye ReplySwiftDesk
about.description1: ReplySwiftDesk ni sosiyete yo kwamamaza kuri internet n’ubufasha bw’abakozi b’ikorana n’ikoranabuhanga ikorera i Kigali, ifasha ibigo gukura ku murongo.
about.description2: Twihuza udushya, uburyo bwo gukoresha imibare n’ikoranabuhanga kugira ngo duhe abakiriya bacu ibisubizo byiza cyane.
about.whyDescription: Dutanga ibisubizo byihuse kandi byihariye mu kwamamaza, bijyanye n’intego zawe, bifite ubuhanga bw’umuntu n’ikoranabuhanga rigezweho.
about.howDescription1: Uburyo dukoresha butangira no kumenya ibyo ukeneye, tukagena gahunda iboneye yo kugera ku ntego zawe.
about.howDescription2: Witeguye gutera intambwe ikurikira? Vugana n’ikipe yacu uyu munsi binyuze kuri

faqItems.question: Ni iki gituma nashora mu kwamamaza kuri internet uyu munsi i Kigali kandi ni izihe serivisi zindi mushobora gutanga kugira ngo ubucuruzi bwanjye bukure?
faqItems.answer: Kushora mu kwamamaza kuri internet uyu munsi ni ingenzi kugira ngo ugume imbere y’abahatana ku isoko riri gukura i Kigali. Hamwe na gahunda iboneye, ubucuruzi bwawe bushobora kugera ku bantu baboneye, kongera kumenyekana kw’ikirango, kubona abakiriya benshi, no kuzamura ubucuruzi bwihuse kuruta uburyo busanzwe. Muri ReplySwiftDesk, ntidukora gusa ubukangurambaga — dutanga ibisubizo byihariye bihuriza hamwe kwamamaza kuri internet, imiyoborere y’imbuga nkoranyambaga, gusana imbuga za internet, ubukangurambaga bwo kohereza emails, n’ubufasha bw’abakozi b’ikoranabuhanga.

faqItems.question: Ni izihe serivisi mutanga?
faqItems.answer: Dutanga serivisi zose zifasha ubucuruzi bwawe gukura vuba: gahunda zo kwamamaza kuri internet, imiyoborere y’imbuga nkoranyambaga, gusana no kongera imiterere y’imbuga za internet, ubukangurambaga bwo kohereza emails, ndetse n’ubufasha bw’abakozi b’ikoranabuhanga.

faqItems.question: Muri he?
faqItems.answer: Dukorera i Kigali, mu Rwanda, ariko serivisi zacu zigezweho ku isi hose tubikesha gukorana hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga n’imiyoboro igezweho.

faqItems.question: Natangira nte gukorana namwe?
faqItems.answer: Biroroshye gutangira. Vugana natwe binyuze ku rupapuro rwacu rwo guhamagara, tuzakora inama ngufi yo kumenya ibyo ukeneye, intego zawe n’imbogamizi. Hanyuma, tuzakora gahunda yihariye igamije gutanga ibisubizo byihuse, bifatika kandi birambye.
